Title: Episode #3.5
Writer: Rob Delaney (created and written by), Sharon Horgan (created and written by)
Actors: Sharon Horgan, Rob Delaney, Mark Bonnar, Jonathan Forbes
Plot: Sharon and Fergal go home to visit their father who is unwell. Rob returns to work, making friends with a young colleague who recently started. Rob and Sharon reluctantly agree to hire their old babysitter.
